backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining all data types (Class, Session, Assignment, Quiz, Attendance, etc.) and storage maps for the educational platform with authorization, blob storage, and user approval mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module that passes through old state unchanged for canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented navigation systems, routing logic, and dashboard implementations for all user roles (Teacher, Student, Parent, Admin) with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend components including authentication, profile management, navigation, layouts, and role-specific pages with React Router integration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for the educational platform's warm orange/terracotta theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application titled 'Way of Learning' with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with TanStack Router setup, authentication flow, role-based routing for all user types, and conditional rendering of role selection modal based on user profile state.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleSelecti: Modal dialog for first-time user role selection (Teacher/Student/Parent) with timeout handling, error states, retry logic, and profile creation mutation without page reloads.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout component with responsive header, side navigation (desktop), bottom navigation (mobile), and logout functionality. Manages mobile menu state and renders child content in a scrollable main area.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Mobile-only bottom navigation bar that displays role-specific menu items (teacher, student, parent, admin) with icons and active state highlighting. Fixed at bottom of viewport on small screens.
frontend/src/components/layout/SideNavig: Desktop sidebar navigation component that renders role-specific menu items with icons and active state styling. Supports optional callback on navigation for mobile sheet closure.
frontend/src/components/parent/LinkChild: Modal dialog for parents to link a child's account by entering their student ID. Handles form submission with validation and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Reusable avatar component that displays user profile photo or fallback initials/icon. Supports three size variants (sm, md, lg) and handles external blob image URLs.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileF: Profile editing form with fields for name, phone, class/section, and profile photo upload. Handles file upload with progress tracking and saves user profile data with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/shared/Assignmen: Card component displaying assignment details including title, description, due date, points, and status badges (overdue/due soon). Provides navigation to assignment detail view.
frontend/src/components/shared/Dashboard: Reusable dashboard metric card with icon, title, value, and optional description. Supports four color variants (default, success, warning, info) for visual differentiation.
frontend/src/components/shared/EmptyStat: Generic empty state component displaying title, description, optional image, and action button. Used for showing placeholder content when data is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/shared/LoadingSp: Animated loading spinner component with configurable size (sm, md, lg) and optional text label. Uses Lucide's Loader2 icon with rotation animation.
frontend/src/components/shared/MaterialC: Card component for displaying study materials (files or video links) with appropriate icons and action buttons for downloading files or opening external links.
frontend/src/components/shared/SessionCa: Displays a session card with title, date/time, duration, and optional video link. Shows badges for instant sessions and today's sessions, with a button to join via video link.
frontend/src/components/student/ClassEnr: Modal dialog for students to join a class by entering an enrollment code. Handles form submission and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/student/StudentC: Card component displaying a class for students with the class name and a button to navigate to the class detail page.
frontend/src/components/teacher/Assignme: Modal form for teachers to create assignments with title, description, due date, and max points. Converts dates to BigInt nanoseconds for backend storage.
frontend/src/components/teacher/ClassCar: Card component for teachers showing class name, student count, and enrollment code with copy-to-clipboard functionality. Includes navigation to class detail page.
frontend/src/components/teacher/ClassCre: Modal form for teachers to create a new class with name and enrollment code. Includes a code generator that creates random 6-character uppercase codes.
frontend/src/components/teacher/Material: Tabbed modal allowing teachers to upload study materials either as files (with upload progress tracking) or as video links. Handles file conversion to ExternalBlob for backend storage.
frontend/src/components/teacher/SessionS: Modal form for teachers to schedule or start instant sessions with title, date/time, duration, and optional video link. Converts timestamps to BigInt nanoseconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication. Initializes access control with admin token and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend API operations including user profiles, classes, sessions, assignments, grades, attendance, study materials, messages, and admin functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including primary, secondary, muted, destructive, and chart color definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
Admin dashboard showing user statistics (teachers, students, parents) with navigation cards to user management and platform monitoring pages.
Placeholder page for platform monitoring and analytics features that are coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Displays a list of all users with their names, IDs, and user types in card format for admin management.
frontend/src/pages/parent/ChildDetailPag: Placeholder page for viewing detailed progress information for a specific child, identified by childId route parameter.
frontend/src/pages/parent/ChildrenPage.t: Displays an empty state prompting parents to link their children's accounts to monitor their progress.
frontend/src/pages/parent/ParentDashboar: Parent dashboard with a button to open LinkChildModal for linking children's accounts, showing empty state when no children are linked.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays a card containing the ProfileForm component for users to edit their profile settings.
frontend/src/pages/shared/ApprovalReques: Displays account approval status and allows users to request approval from administrators, showing pending, approved, or request states.
frontend/src/pages/shared/CalendarPage.t: Displays upcoming sessions and assignment due dates in chronological order, combining events from both sources into a unified calendar view.
frontend/src/pages/shared/DiscussionsPag: Placeholder page for discussion forums feature that is currently under development.
frontend/src/pages/shared/LandingPage.ts: Landing page component displaying hero section with login button, feature cards for teachers/students/parents, and footer with branding. Uses Internet Identity authentication hook.
frontend/src/pages/shared/MessagesPage.t: Messaging interface allowing users to send messages by receiver ID and view received messages with timestamps. Includes form validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/student/AssignmentsPa: Student view displaying all assignments with title, description, due date, max points, and past-due status badges. Shows empty state when no assignments exist.
frontend/src/pages/student/AttendancePag: Student attendance dashboard showing attendance percentage summary and detailed records with present/late/absent status icons and dates. Displays empty state when no records exist.
frontend/src/pages/student/GradesPage.ts: Student grades view listing graded assignments with scores and optional teacher comments. Shows empty state when no grades are available.
frontend/src/pages/student/MaterialsPage: Student page displaying study materials in a grid layout using MaterialCard components. Shows empty state when no materials are uploaded.
frontend/src/pages/student/ProgressRepor: Placeholder page for future progress analytics feature, currently showing only an empty state with coming soon message.
frontend/src/pages/student/QuizzesPage.t: Placeholder page for quizzes feature, currently showing only an empty state indicating no quizzes are available.
frontend/src/pages/student/StudentClassD: Detailed class view with tabs for sessions, materials, and assignments filtered by class ID. Displays appropriate empty states for each tab when no content exists.
frontend/src/pages/student/StudentDashbo: Student dashboard page displaying enrolled classes, upcoming sessions, pending assignments, and average grade with a modal to join new classes via enrollment code.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/AssignmentDet: Assignment detail page for teachers showing assignment ID with placeholder for future grading interface functionality.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/ClassDetailPa: Teacher class detail page with tabs for sessions, materials, assignments, and students, including modals for scheduling sessions, uploading materials, and creating assignments.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/MaterialsPage: Teacher materials page displaying all study materials across classes with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/QuizzesPage.t: Placeholder page for quiz management feature showing an empty state indicating the feature is under development.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/SessionDetail: Session detail page for teachers showing session ID with placeholder for future attendance tracking interface.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/TeacherDashbo: Teacher dashboard page displaying created classes, upcoming sessions, and active assignments with a modal to create new classes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and sessionStorage values, supporting both regular and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended theme settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file defining an educational platform with 4 user roles (Teacher, Student, Parent, Admin) featuring messaging, attendance, assignments, quizzes, materials, discussions, and calendar. Built with Motoko backend, React/TypeScript frontend, Internet Identity authentication, and includes 11 existing features covering navigation, dashboards, and core educational functionality.
